tool_description: EnrichData provides ML Plugins support i.e. Contact Information Extractor (API extracts the contact information from given text), NER Extraction (API extracts the multiple entity details from the given text) and Resume Template Creation (API creates resume into a specified template resume format).
name: ML Plugins
title: ML Plugins

api_list.name: NER Extraction Plugin
api_list.description: NER Extraction Plugin gives the entity details like start location, end location, job, city, state, country, name, degree, org, skill, date and year.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ml-plugins.p.rapidapi.com/nerTagger"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ml-plugins.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Resume Template Creation Plugin
api_list.description: Resume Template Creation Plugin API creates resume into a specified template resume format.

api_list.name: Contact Information Extraction Plugin
api_list.description: Contact Information Extraction is an Rest API plugin, that uses algorithm for extracting Name, Email, City, State, Country, Website, Phone Number, and Address from the given text content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ml-plugins.p.rapidapi.com/contactExtractor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ml-plugins.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
